trans-unit.source: Specifies the visibility of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> for scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤할 수 있는 콘텐츠의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 표시 여부를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 열거형을 사용 하 여 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> 의 속성 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The member values of this enumeration specify <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> visibility in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: 이 열거형의 멤버 값을 지정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 지정 된 방향의 표시 유형입니다.

trans-unit.source: These member values also specify whether the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> dimension is applied to its enclosed content.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 멤버 값을 지정할 수도 있는지 여부를 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 차원이 포함 된 콘텐츠에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> content, you set the viewport size for the content.
trans-unit.target: 적용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> 를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 콘텐츠에 대 한 뷰포트 크기를 설정 하면 콘텐츠입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the member values of this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는이 열거형의 멤버 값을 설정 하려면 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> appears and the dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> is applied to the content when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: 뷰포트에 일부 콘텐츠를 표시할 수 없으면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />가 나타나고 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />의 차원이 콘텐츠에 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the width of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.

For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the height of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: 뷰포트에 일부 콘텐츠를 표시할 수 없는 경우에도 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />가 표시되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the content is set to the corresponding dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> parent.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠의 차원은 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 부모의 해당 차원으로 설정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the width of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.

For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the height of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: 뷰포트에 일부 콘텐츠를 표시할 수 없는 경우에도 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />가 표시되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> is not applied to the content.
The dimension of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> is applied to the content.

For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the width of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.

For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, the height of the content is set to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
